pullrequest.title: Fix help messages generated by segway -h and segway annotate -h

content.raw:
Where does the text `Semi-automated genome annotation. Please see: segway TASK -h, for stepsspecific to each task`\` come form? I don’t see it in the source below? Check spelling. Can you please put in the output of \`segway -h\` now?

Please change the description from “Semi-automated genome annotation” to “Segmentation and automated genome annotation” per an upcoming paper by Libbrecht, Chan, and Hoffman.

Just use a single hyphen and spaces, no need to use vertical bars.
content.html:
Where does the text Semi-automated genome annotation. Please see: segway TASK -h, for stepsspecific to each task` come form? I don’t see it in the source below? Check spelling. Can you please put in the output of `segway -h` now?

Please change the description from “Semi-automated genome annotation” to “Segmentation and automated genome annotation” per an upcoming paper by Libbrecht, Chan, and Hoffman.

Just use a single hyphen and spaces, no need to use vertical bars.
